tips: 🔧 Run sudo dmesg | less to scan for hardware issues.
⚙️ Use journalctl -xe for detailed service error logs.
📦 Debian user? apt list --upgradable shows pending updates.
🧰 Check if TRIM is enabled: sudo fstrim -v /
🔒 Harden SSH: disable root login in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.
📡 No Wi-Fi? Try rfkill list to check wireless block status.
🧮 Check CPU flags with lscpu | grep Flags for virtualization support.
📈 Analyze disk usage: ncdu / is a friendly alternative to du.
